name: rehome-v1
description: A modern full-stack web application for rehoming pets - Laravel 11 + React 18 + Filament v3

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && composer install && php artisan key:generate && php artisan migrate --force && php artisan db:seed --force

author: Armando Lopez <armando@rehome.build>
